definition: putting seeds or young plants in the ground to grow
details:
noun
- putting seeds or young plants in the ground to grow
= example: putting seeds or young plants in the ground to grow
- the act of fixing firmly in place
= example: the act of fixing firmly in place
- a collection of plants (trees or shrubs or flowers) in a particular area
= example: a collection of plants (trees or shrubs or flowers) in a particular area
